history.proof: intros. unfold Rdiv. sfirstorder use: RtoC_mult, RtoC_inv unfold: Cdiv.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of Rdiv_plus (_ / _ + _ / _)%R does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment H0 : forall a b c d : R, (b = 0 -> False) -> (d = 0 -> False) -> (a / b + c / d)%R = ((a * d + c * b) / (b * d))%R x, y : R H : y = 0 -> False Unable to unify "x / y" with "RtoC (x * / y)".

In environment H0 : forall a b c d : R, (b = 0 -> False) -> (d = 0 -> False) -> (a / b + c / d)%R = ((a * d + c * b) / (b * d))%R x, y : R H : y = 0 -> False Unable to unify "False" with "(x * / y)%R = x / y".

In environment H1 : forall a b c d : R, (b = 0 -> False) -> (d = 0 -> False) -> (a / b + c / d)%R = ((a * d + c * b) / (b * d))%R x, y : R H : y = 0 -> False Unable to unify "False" with "(x * / y)%R = x / y".

original: intros. intros H. unfold Rdiv. rewrite Rdiv_plus. - reflexivity. - apply H. - apply H.
